text: Cassim Chilumpha (born 29 November 1959) is a Malawian politician. He was the Vice-President of Malawi from 2004 to 2009. Chilumpha was born in Chiutula Village, Nkhotakota City, Malawi. == References == Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Vice presidents of Malawi
title: Cassim Chilumpha
